long_description: The fast and light Inov8 Trailroc(TM) 245 Trail-Running Shoes are your ticket to minimalist running performance when you're training and racing on the trail. Breathable synthetic mesh uppers feature thermoplastic urethane overlays for support. Sythetic mesh linings offer moisture management to keep feet dry and comfortable. Injection-molded EVA midsoles offer lightweight support and cushioning; 3mm heel-to-drop positions feet low to the ground. 5-finger polymer shanks align with each metatarsal for increased protection and flexibility underfoot. Multi-density rubber outsoles on the Inov8 Trailroc 245 Trail-Running Shoes wear evenly, and they offer superior traction on varied terrain. All-synthetic construction makes these vegan-friendly.
short_description: The fast and light Inov8 Trailroc(TM) 245 Trail-Running Shoes are your ticket to minimalist running performance when you're training and racing on the trail.
